name: Candy Wars
description:
This is a story driven game, similar to a "tell tale" game where you can choose the path you're taking and let the game do the rest for you, in some funny animations that remember your choises!

More updates will come,  fixing any bugs you might (and probably will) encounter.

Changes after the deadline:

  1. Achivements: There are now 16 new achivements to look for!
  2. If you complete the game, you'll be allowed to skip the dialoge.
